description: Detects the suspicious minimized start of MsEdge browser, which can be used to download files from the Internet Author: Florian Roth. License: https://github.com/Neo23x0/sigma/blob/master/LICENSE.Detection.Rules.md
false_positives: Software that uses MsEdge to download components in the background (see ParentImage, ParentCommandLine)
name: Suspicious Minimized MSEdge Start
